entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Our President Trump is Shining through to make sure, every one does what they need to do. But those who refuse to listen to the Safety and Distancing Rules. Don't blame him for what you've so Carelessly have done. Your old enough to Set an Example, and to help Coronavirus go.
